mapper.insert: insert into member (phone, name, avatar, open_id, gender, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, remark) values (#{phone}, #{name}, #{avatar}, #{openId}, #{gender}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{remark})
mapper.update:
UPDATE member
phone = #{phone},
name = #{name},
avatar = #{avatar},
open_id = #{openId},
gender = #{gender},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
remark = #{remark},
WHERE id = #{id}
